{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:11.380
    | text      = Kinky is a very public about being friends with both Bill Clinton and George W. Bush.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:17.699
    | text      = He wrote in an article in Texas Monthly about Clinton, quote, I was just minding my business
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:22.939
    | text      = one day seven years ago promoting my latest mystery novel at a book signing in Austin
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:27.100
    | text      = at Barnes and Noble.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:28.100
    | text      = That's the greatest sentence I've ever heard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:29.539
    | text      = I had just told the crowd that the reading and signing were free, but there would be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:33.260
    | text      = a two latte minimum.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:34.859
    | text      = A guy came up to me and said, quote, sign one for the president.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:38.460

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:41.779
    | text      = inscriptions, yours in Christ or see you in hell, and forgot about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:45.979
    | text      = Little bit less fun.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:47.340
    | text      = Two weeks later, the postmaster in Medina brought me an express envelope and said in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:51.140
    | text      = an excited tone, Kinky, you've got a letter from the White Horse Saloon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:55.380
    | text      = You know that place in Nashville where they do all the line dancing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:58.420
    | text      = I looked at the envelope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:22:59.420
    | text      = It did not say White Horse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:00.539
    | text      = It said White House.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:01.899
    | text      = Inside the envelope was a letter from President Clinton.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:04.539
    | text      = And at the bottom he had written, I have now read all your books.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:07.520
    | text      = Sure, please.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:08.520
    | text      = I really need the laughs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:10.020
    | text      = And that was the beginning of a three-year pen pal relationship during which we discussed
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:13.819
    | text      = many things from foreign affairs to more metaphysical matters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:17.300

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:27.899

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:28.899
    | text      = I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:29.899
    | text      = So then about Bush, quote, I first met George W. Bush about four years ago at the Texas
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Book Festival.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:34.260

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = having another Chavez Regal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:42.460
    | text      = This guy's great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:43.460
    | text      = I love this guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:45.460
    | text      = He's a good writer too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:46.460
    | text      = I love Kinky Friedman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:48.180
    | text      = In a flash of misguided inspiration, I had taken Larry McMurtry's unclaimed name tag
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:52.739
    | text      = and slapped it on.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:54.140
    | text      = In a matter of- This is great too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:23:58.659
    | text      = Fuck Larry McMurtry.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:00.500
    | text      = In a matter of moments, people were coming up to me and telling me how much they admired
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:03.720
    | text      = my work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:04.720
    | text      = Not wanting to burst their bubble and fairly hammered by then, I played along.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = You've done so much for Texas, Mr. McMurtry, one lady told me.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:11.260
    | text      = Love it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:12.260
    | text      = Thank you kindly, I replied.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:13.260
    | text      = The governor, having witnessed this little exchange-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:15.220

    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:16.220

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:19.220

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:22.739
    | text      = Walk two rivers or whatever it is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:29.100
    | text      = Look, governor, I said, McMurtry's a shy little booger.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = He'd never do this for himself.

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:42.579
    | text      = George W. Bush laughed and whispered something to several of his aides, leading me to believe
}}

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:50.420

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:56.300
    | text      = I love this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:24:58.859
    | text      = George W. Bush- This is one of the few moments of-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:01.539
    | text      = Of pure joy I've ever experienced on this show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = George W. Bush invites him to come to the White House, which he does.

{{TranscriptBlock

    | timestamp = 01:25:07.460
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:08.460
    | text      = And so discussing his friendship with George W. Bush and Bill Clinton-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:15.739

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:16.739
    | text      = Discussing the friendships that he has with these two presidents.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:18.500
    | text      = He says, quote, some might ask particularly in these days how the president can afford
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = to maintain such a lighthearted friendship.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:26.439
    | text      = The answer is, particularly these days, everyone needs a laugh and everyone needs a friend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:31.500
    | text      = Also, as early as 2005, Kinky was saying in interviews that he did not believe that rifles
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:36.979
    | text      = should be allowed with magazines higher than five.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:39.920
    | text      = So he's friends with two globalist presidents and believes in gun control.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:44.699
    | text      = But because he's famous, Alex is totally cool with him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:48.140
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:49.140
    | text      = And glosses past all of them.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:50.140
    | text      = Star fucker defeats all of Alex's principles.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:53.560
    | text      = Also just to be clear, his name is Kinky, but it's not meant to be a dirty thing.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = That's not about like sexual Kinky.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:25:59.220
    | text      = I didn't care one way or the other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It was a nickname given to him in college because of his curly hair.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Interestingly, his nickname was given to him by a guy named Chinga-

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = All right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:26:12.380
    | text      = Who would mysteriously- No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
